commit.message:
scripted-diff: Use UniValue.pushKV instead of push_back(Pair())

-BEGIN VERIFY SCRIPT-
git grep -l "push_back(Pair" | xargs sed -i "s/push_back(Pair(\(.*\)));/pushKV(\1);/g"
-END VERIFY SCRIPT-
